name: Lemmings
description:
The Lemmings are on the loose and that can only mean one thing - trouble! Danger is barely a footstep away for the relentlessly marching hordes of cutesy, green-haired rodents.

Save the Lemmings in 150+ levels of frenetic bashing, digging, building, climbing and mining!
Create your own game levels and wirelessly share them with other Lemmings fans via Infrastructure Mode
